data.title: RC Competency-By-Design Ebook e
data.meta_description: Rc Competency-By-Design eBook e - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the need to reshape Canadian medical education through the Competence by Design initiative. It outlines some strengths of the current postgraduate medical education system, including its global reputation and innovations. However, it also identifies challenges, such as complexity in the system, increasing accountability, and resource constraints. The Competence by Design project aims to address these challenges and opportunities to transform postgraduate medical education in Canada.
